creator: radhasattanathan@fico.com
text:
I loaded a WSDL and i got the list of drop down values to select from in the Web methods. When i selected one and clicked configure it loaded the other details( path, soap action etc.,) but when i clicked save the selection in the Web methods went back to the first one in the list.
This leaves me confused as to if the application is testing the correct web method.

Can you please verify and fix this bug.

creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
text:
Works for me as of 2.9 version.
Also note this element has been deprecated as of 2.9 version so no more fixes will be done on it. You can use HTTP sampler as replacement.
